column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Now when I think Chicago I think deep dish pizza. I have tried a number of deep dish pizza places
column2: and this is THE place that I think it well worth the wait. After hearing from a number of Yelpers and locals
column3: I was really excited to try this place. Coming in on a Friday night at 7pm
column4: there was a good 45 minute wait for a party of 4.
